item.description:
What's New in Ollamac 3.0.2

  • Added font size configuration for markdown rendering. Thanks to @pd95!
  • Fixed the "stop" button functionality during text generation. Thanks to @pd95!
  • Added blockquote markdown support for r1 model thinking. Thanks to @Harryjeffs!
  • Fixed chat window shortcuts. Thanks to @pd95!
  • Fixed title generation for deepseek-r1 model. Thanks to @kevinhermawan!
  • Prevented empty prompts from being sent. Thanks to @pd95!

For a complete list of changes, visit our Full Changelog.
